thread.title: Linda Costantino
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Linda Costantino

author: Linda Costantino
title: Linda Costantino
text: Bought my first white mountain puzzle:Nantucket , to do with my grandkids. We all had a great time putting it together, recognizing all the places we knew. Loved it so much, just finished "I Love New England", and we're looking forward to the historical New England puzzle. Really a nice way to spend time with our grandchildren.
